title: Fragment, ca. 1895
description: Four scenes; 'HONOR TO THE IRON WORKER' with a man sitting on an anvil, 'AFTER WORK THE HAPPY HOME' with a domestic setting, 'LABOR IS HONORABLE' with people streaming into a factory, 'THE TWO POWERS IN ACCORD' with figures representing labor and Capital shaking hands. Three reds and three greens.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, ca. 1895.
ca. 1895. Roller-printed on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-272.
